title: Beautiful Palace
text: It was a lovely day out taking the tube from Center of the city. Beautiful place and good audio explanation. Try to book your ticket before you get there so you know your entry time for the Palace. Don't carry big backpack or otherwise be prepared to queue to hand it in for safe keeping.

title: Good all round
text: Good all round including the bill! We were lucky to have the table booked 30 minutes before hand on a Wednesday evening; Lovely food; service is ok, nothing extraordinary though. It's pricey for what it is, in my opinion.

title: Friendly and knowledgeable
text: By reaching the railway station, we found no official information to explain how we can tour the palaces located in the mountain! Bruno approached us explained ALL options till I asked what he can offer, no hard sale!! The three of use decided to have his service and that is the best decision! He is knowledgeable about the region, passionate about his work, courteous and keen to help! Having spent the day with him, he dropped us in a local resturant at our request, parked the car, walked us to the resturant, explained all the details about the food, how to get the train station to return to Lisbon etc. etc. Nothing was too much trouble! He gave us a very pleasant day! Highly recommended!

title: A good hotel
text: This is a good hotel with good facilities and friendly staff. Breakfast is good. The location is convenient for tube and taxi ride to Plaka etc. the Center only costs €5. I recommend to try and Ancient Greek Massage with Maria here. Also the roof top is a must! The resturant opposite of the hotel Alexandra the Great is also a must. All in all, it's very good. By the way, taxi from airport to the hotel is €44 which is fixed price.

title: Best museum
text: This is the best museum we have visited by its design, displays, space, view and entry fee! Wonderful experience

title: Wonderful food
text: Wonderful food, friendly staff, artistic display of food! It's located the opposite of our hotel so it became our regular place to visit while we were here!

title: The beginning of western civilisation!
text: It was great to be here, finally! We had a great guide to explain the history in details and was so beautiful to see it all in person!

title: Great film in a great setting
text: Following a local friend’s recommendation we went to the cinema. Both my husband and daughter had never been to an outdoor cinema. It was great experience with the setting!

title: Lovely!
text: They treated Coffee with love and professional manners! Good written material about what they do and staff are knowledgeable what they offer too! Tested the best coffee there.

title: Caring hotel
text: Very good location, facility and friendly staff. My husband was unwell and they got out of their way to help by bringing tea to the room, sending lovely card etc. Staff at the reception gave good description of what the local shops are so we were very impressed!

title: Great dinner
text: Brilliant dinner and excellent service. It's a must if visit Rio. Buffet style but with some very good seafood and beef!

title: Good hotel
text: The hotel is in a Very good location with helpful staff. The room is very good size. Staff Speaking English too! Seaside view. You can sleep with the sound of waves of Leme beach. All for all, can be recommended!

title: Good location
text: Very good location. Newly refurbished I believe. Room is on the small side but lovely bathroom. Given it's convenient location I don't mind the smaller room - friendly staff - small room for breakfast so sometimes you have to wait

title: Nice location!
text:
Very good location, friendly staff and good facilities. Food is good and breakfast is always good!

Swimming pool etc. is very useful.

One thing I don't understand is why they supply copied Times newspapers? But that's not important.

title: Beautiful City Wall!
text:
It makes a wonderful half day out! It takes about 1.5 hours to complete allowing stopping etc. Different views at different parts gives a good understanding of the history.

We came in the Winter and on a day when there is strong wind! But it didn't make the visit difficult at all.

Lovely day out!

title: Good food
text: Good tasty food although a bit too oily for me. Very friendly staff. Nice settings. A place can be recommended

title: Excellent hospitality
text:
A warm welcome awaits you at this lovely farm house situated close to Motorway for travel to Liverpool, Manchester and the Northwest.

Very comfortable room and delicious English breakfast prepared me for a busy day ahead.

Look forward to my next visit!

title: Very Good
text: This old hotel maintained its charming style and standard although certain part is old. Friendly staff. The meeting room we booked was sufficient although there is a kind of smell which is strange. Wifi was fast enough and breakfast was very good.

title: Average experience
text: Very easy to travel to from airport by BART. Nice to be a historic hotel but I have to say the room is small, bathroom is small, not much air, old carpet make you feel not too clean. We were with our 14 years' old daughter so the room is even smaller. Average really - I would rather stay in a more modern hotel.

title: A nice experience
text:
Lovely friendly staff, nice free breakfast, spacious room, free airport transfers, reliable wifi, good location for the free train to city Center, the swimming pool must be nice for children although we have not used it.

altogether a very nice experience! Can be recommended for sure.
place: Crystal Inn Hotel & Suites Salt Lake City - Downtown

title: Highly recommended
text:
This small downtown motel offers excellent service and good value for money. The room is nice and clean. The facility is adequate and sufficient.

The proprietor Cheryl was especially helpful and considerate. We look forward to our next return stay!

title: Disaster Service
text:
On arrival of this West Yellowstone Self Catering Studios and Cabins, within the first encounter with the owner, Sessel Sagorin, we were threatened by him and told he will not provide the services he has charged and agreed. Police was involved and we lost all the money we paid! Having re-arranged our tour with the help of local police, local newspaper editor and many others, we found out he is known to the area for his temper, rudeness and fraud. Unfortunately it seems nobody could stop him from trading!!

Without going into great details, all we can advice people is NOT to use this company at all!!

It puts shame on this great country, world class travel destination and its friendly people!
